Message:
Heh-heh-heh,
so the time has finally come...!

The time for me to attain
the Holy Miracle
with these two hands...!

It all started a few minutes prior,
or more accurately, just now.

I heard tell of
a certain rumor...
A rumor about
the Holy Miracle!

A celebration that comes but
once a year—the Holy Night.

On that special night,
it’s said that if you
make a wish under a large tree,

the Holy Overlord shall descend,
and make your wish come true...!

Well, in other words,
as long as you make a wish
under a large tree,
it’s guaranteed to come true...!

And, the noble recipient
of the miracle’s blessing
is but one soul—
the Holy Overlord’s chosen one!

Heh-heh...! I’ll get my hands on
that miracle no matter—

No, scratch that...
I, the Shining Star
of Holy Darkness,
will be chosen!
